author: sky.cactus
content: How does one "read" the current Ethereum specification in the execution-specs repository?

author: sky.cactus
content: Like if I wanted to read about how the gas limit can be adjusted by block producers, where would I go to look that up?

author: sky.cactus
content: The execution specs repository seems to be divided into forks, but I don't want a diff, I want "current ruleset".

author: sky.cactus
content: cc <@243183686562873344> or <@689161464829050960>, since surely you aren't doing anything better today than answering questions about Ethereum Execution Specs.  ðŸŽ…

author: sky.cactus
content: Actually, I think I found it.  I guess each folder is a full copy of the spec for that version.
